data.title: Hardcore Original 1979 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1979 U.S. one sheet poster for the film Hardcore directed by Paul Schrader with George C. Scott / Peter Boyle / Season Hubley / Dick Sargent.
